thread.title: Mum of boys has priceless reaction to learning she's having a girl
thread.title_full: Mum of boys has priceless reaction to learning she's having a girl

author: The Morning Show Published Mins Ago
title: Mum of boys has priceless reaction to learning she's having a girl
text:
Share Mum of boys has priceless reaction to learning she's having a girl 
Egreis Gjergjani and her husband Jeremy have two sons, ages 1 and 3 -- and when they found out they were expecting a third child, Egreis naturally thought she'd be having a boy. 
But at their recent gender reveal party, Egreis was floored (quite literally) to discover she was having a baby girl, after cutting into a cake with pink icing inside. 
Her video has been viewed nearly 800,000 times since being uploaded to Instagram. 
Credit: Instagram/linerss55
